name: Tyler Martinez
persona: Tyler Martinez is a 20-year-old Business Administration major who has struggled academically, reflected by a CGPA of 0.81. He tends to have low motivation and self-discipline when it comes to his studies, and often finds it hard to set and pursue high grade goals. Despite these challenges, Tyler doesn’t experience much test anxiety, but his low perseverance and self-efficacy make it difficult for him to turn things around. He may benefit from academic support services and strategies to boost his motivation and study habits.
